sentence.Network_en: The wheel's rubbing on the mudguard.

entry.tran: (自行车或车辆的)挡泥板，叶子板
entry.def: The mudguards of a bicycle or other vehicle are curved pieces of metal or plastic above the tyres, which stop mud getting on the rider or vehicle.

means.word_mean: 1. a curved piece above the wheel of a bicycle or motorcycle to protect the rider from water or mud thrown up by the wheels

auth_sentence.content: Then he rushes to my side and, together with the mechanic and his family, leads me over to sit on the Beetle's mudguard.
